sentence: But only a few days later, during a segment with Rep. Jim Jordan, Tucker voiced the same sentiment more clearly: “I think we should probably take the side of Russia,” he said, “if we have to choose between Russia and Ukraine.” Despite saying that he was "just kidding" about rooting for Russia over Ukraine, Tucker just doubled down on supporting the Russians in the conflict.
